Text: Jan Meeting of the Electricity Restructuring Advisory Board Cc Colleagues We look forward to the first meeting of The Electricity Restructuring Advisory Board The meeting will be held in Montreal January commencing at am at the Commission for Environmental Cooperation CEC StJacques Street West Suite The CEC will cover all travel expenses along with accommodations and per diem Kindly complete the attached Confirmation of Participation form and return it to Leticia Villeneuve by Dec or fax so that we can arrange your travel plans Since the holidays are almost here please note that after this Dec deadline we ask that you arrange your own travelhotel and the CEC will reimburse you for an economy priced ticket Please do not hesitate to contact me should you have any questions or concerns Thank you Yolanda Clegg Yolanda Clegg MSc Environment Economy and Trade Program North American Commission for Environmental Cooperation rue StJacques Ouest bureau Montreal Quebec CANADA HY N tel fax Confirmationenglishdoc Confirmation Spanishdoc

NACEC electricity documents Cc Steve Kean As per your request please find attached the following background documents related to NACECs Initiative Environmental Challenges and Opportunities of the Evolving Continental Electricity Market background report prepared for the first Advisory Board meeting proceedings from the first Advisory Board meeting sincerely Yolanda Clegg elecbkgedoc proceedingsedoc

documents for May conference call Cc Advisory Board Member Thank you for your continued support of NACECs Initiative Environmental Challenges and Opportunities of the Evolving Continental Electricity Market Please find attached the following documents for your review and to be further discussed during the conference call Thursday May at EST an Interim Note for the Secretariat report a draft recommendations checklist for initial discussion a list of the advisory board members and bios please note that we have shortened some of the bios if you have yet to submit a bio please send a copy to Items to be discussed during conference call I Secretariat update progress expert report symposium II Process and approach for developing guidelinesrecommendations III Initial discussion of guidelinesrecommendations IV nd Advisory Board meeting date and venue Details of the conference call Participants from Canada and the United States should dial toll free Participants from Mexico should dial and ask the operator to charge this telephone call to the telephone number then enter the following Code If there is any problem with the communication during the call please dial Conference call reference C On behalf of my colleagues at NACEC Sincerely Yolanda Clegg Yolanda Clegg MSc Environment Economy and Trade Program North American Commission for Environmental Cooperation rue StJacques Ouest bureau Montreal Quebec CANADA HY N tel fax Interim Notedoc Recommendations checklistdoc Members and Biosdoc

Meeting Jan The evolving continental electricity market and the environmentSteve Kean Please find attached information concerning the upcoming meeting of the Advisory Board on Environmental Challenges and Opportunities of the Evolving Continental Electricity Market We are sorry that you are unable to attend however if after reading the supplied information you have any questions or comments that you would like to be raised during the course of the meeting please inform me of them and I will make sure to discuss them during the meeting Please let me know if you would like a conference call set up to participate in part of the meeting Thank you and we will keep you informed on the outcome of the meeting Sincerely Yolanda Clegg Yolanda Clegg MSc Environment Economy and Trade Program North American Commission for Environmental Cooperation rue StJacques Ouest bureau Montreal Quebec CANADA HY N tel fax AGENDAdoc Participant Listdoc Electricity Working Draftdoc Table Eligible renewable energy resourcesdoc

update and documents for review Cc Advisory Board member Thank you for your continued support of the CECs initiative Environmental Challenges and Opportunities of the Evolving Continental Electricity Market Please find attached the following documents for your review The proceedings of the last conference call Key issues of the initiative A preliminary draft agenda of the upcoming CEC sponsored Symposium We welcome your comments and suggestions on the above documents In particular additions or edits to the key issues document as well as possible speakers andor participants for the upcoming Symposium would be appreciated Please direct any comments to On behalf of my colleagues at the CEC Sincerely Yolanda Clegg Synopsis and Outcomes of calldoc key issuesdoc draft agendadoc

advisory board recommendations for comments Cc Dear Advisory Board members Please find attached a draft version of the CECs recommendations to council which were discussed and prepared during the second Electricity Advisory Board meeting November th at the Institute of the Americas in La Jolla California Your comments and feedback would be greatly appreciated please send comments to Yolanda Clegg by January th We will also be contacting you in the New Year should you wish to further discuss the recommendations or prepare additional textparagraphs for the document We wish you all a very Happy Holiday On behalf of my colleagues at the CEC Sincerely Yolanda Clegg Yolanda Clegg MSc Environment Economy and Trade Program North American Commission for Environmental Cooperation rue StJacques Ouest bureau Montreal Quebec CANADA HY N tel fax
